1213190.name: Destructivator 2 Demo
1213190.description:
Destructivator 2 Demo

Destructivator 2 is an all action platform shooter. The demo will give you a taste of what's on offer in the final game.

The final release will have more than 50 levels and difficulty levels. Be warned, this demo represents the max difficulty level that will come with the final game!

Set across 6 worlds, you'll:

  • Take on legions of enemy foot-soldiers
  • Traverse crafty traps
  • Blow stuff up
  • Take on an army of robots
  • Die quite a lot
  • Take on monstrous bosses
